definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]

sentences.english: And don't get me started on that Liberal anti-British design for the costumes.
sentences.chinese: 别逼我开始自由的反英服装设计。

sentences.english: Propaganda against this country by theltalian government is rife throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 意大利政府在全世界大搞反英宣传。

sentences.english: Lindbergh was startled at the ferocious depth of anti-British feeling.
sentences.chinese: 反英情绪之深之烈令林德伯格大为震惊。

sentences.english: It was a singularly inopportune moment to stage an anti-british demonstration .
sentences.chinese: 在这个时候发动一场反英示威是极不合时宜的。

definition: to discriminate against Chinese people/anti-Chinese (policy, sentiment etc)/Sinophobia
anti-Qing/refers to the revolutionary movements in late 19th and early 20th century leading up to 1911 Xinhai Revolution 辛亥革命[Xin1 hai4 Ge2 ming4]
